subject: UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Barcelona had a mesmerizing run as the premier club in soccer, but it is clear that Bayern Munich is now the top power after it beat the Catalan club by four goals in the Champions League.
snippet: Barcelona had a mesmerizing run as the premier club in soccer, but it is clear that Bayern Munich is now the top power after it beat the Catalan club by four goals in the Champions League.
